newsitem.title: USA: Meteor to buy petroleum marketing company.
newsitem.headline: Meteor to buy petroleum marketing company.

text.p: Meteor Industries Inc said on Tuesday it has signed a non-binding letter of intent to acquire a petroleum marketing and distribution company located in the Rocky Mountain area.
The identification of the company, which has annual sales in excess of $85 million, will not be disclosed prior to the closing of the transaction, Meteor said.
Closing of the deal is expected in August 1997, Meteor said.
The letter of intent is subject to a definitive purchase agreement being executed and approved by the respective boards of directors, the company said.

Edward Names, president of Meteor, said in a statement, "The acquisition would complement our existing operations and is expected to strengthen Meteor's profitability and market position in the Rocky Mountain area."
